The following error appears dozens of times in Jenkins [builds](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/609/consoleText):

`103: [Err] [Scene.cc:2755] Light [sun] not found. Use topic ~/factory/light to spawn a new light.`

This probably means we still have internal functions which are publishing to `~/light/modify` when they actually meant to publish to `~/factory/light`. Or they are trying to update a light too soon and the light doesn't exist yet - the old behaviour would be to create a light in this case.

Light topics were split in pull request #1920
